summary: KANG Tae-sik, a former cop who was once the best man on the force, is now an infamous private detective who handles all kinds of dirty work from catching philanderers to collecting people's debts.
cast: Kyung-gu Sol|Lee Jung-Jin|Dal-su Oh|Sung-min Lee|Jung-hee Moon|Sae-byeok Song|Young-hoon Lee|Yeong-seo Park|Yeong-jin Jo|Byeong-guk Hwang|Kim Jeong-pal|Jin-mo Joo|Hyang-gi Kim
title: Hae-gyeol-sa
